translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事に戻っていいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can go back to work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事どころではないって言うかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not really a matter of work right now, you could say...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雇い主がこれからどうするのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to hear what our employer intends to do from here on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その意向は聞いておきたいし……ねえ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to hear their intentions... right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく、なんなんだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Jeez, what's going on..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス兄様っ、お久しぶりです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Big brother Rance, long time no see!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　香ちゃん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Kaoru-chan?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、お久しぶりです、香姫様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, long time no see, Princess Kaori!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィルさんも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seeral-san too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙で伺いましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard from your letter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に氷から解放されたんですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were truly freed from the ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご挨拶が遅れてすみません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry for the late greetings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またお会い出来て嬉しいです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad to see you again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、何故ここに香ちゃんが？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But why is Kaoru-chan here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の顔を見て表情をパッと華やがせた香が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru's expression brightened when she saw Rance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その言葉で、すぐに顔を暗く沈ませた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but those words quickly made her face darken and become somber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とても、大事なお願いがあって参りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I have come with a very important request."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのー……
何があったのか、私達まだサッパリで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We still don't understand at all what has happened...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、いい加減に説明しろ説明」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, just explain it already."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that's true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、私の口から説明させて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, please allow me to explain it from my side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、人類国家は滅亡の危機に瀕しています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the human nations are facing the threat of extinction."
"...Why is that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「LP7年9月17日、今から二週間ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On LP year 7, September 17th, about two weeks ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリス率いる魔軍の大軍団が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a huge demonic army led by the demon lord Kaebris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めてきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invaded us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「地図をご覧下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please look at the map."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、自由都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ritsus, Zeth, Hellman, and the Free City,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもご存じの四つの大国が同時に攻め込まれました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the four great nations that even Rance knows were attacked all at once."
"...What is the state of the battle?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなり危険な状態です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is a very dangerous situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国も長年、魔軍に対し警戒し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Each country has been on alert against the demon army for years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸西の魔物界への防備を重ねていましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and has strengthened defenses against the Monster Realm in the west of the continent, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故か魔軍は、魔物界と人類側の国境からではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For some reason, the demon army did not attack from the border between the Monster Realm and the human side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の中心地点、キナニ砂漠から侵攻してきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but invaded from the central point of the world, the Kinani Desert."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予想していなかった地点からの攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the attack came from an unexpected point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国は為す術がなかったそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the countries had no way to respond."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「防衛は後手後手に回り、各地で魔軍に敗退しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense fell behind and they were defeated by the demon army in many places."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に各国の防衛軍は半壊、もう長くは保たないと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense forces of each country are already half-destroyed and I don't think they can hold much longer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……えいぷりるふーる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...April Fools'?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、現在まさに起こっている事実です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is the current reality happening right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待て待て！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait, wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスが率いて……と、言ったな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You said the demon lord Kaebris is leading them, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは絶対にありえない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is absolutely impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔物界でホーネット様の軍勢と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kaebris is supposed to be fighting against Hornet-sama's army in the Monster Realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中の筈……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He should be in the middle of that battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大規模な侵攻が出来るわけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way he can be leading such a large-scale invasion..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、長年、魔物界では魔人達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, for many years in the Monster Realm, the demon lords have been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派とケイブリス派、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: divided into two factions: the Hornet faction and the Kaebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つの陣営に別れて戦争していました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they were at war with each other."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのおかげで人類は魔軍に攻められず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to that, humanity wasn't attacked by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までは平和に過ごせていましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and until now, we have lived in peace, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この戦いは三ヶ月ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About three months ago, this war ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派が勝利を収めたようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with the Kaebris faction apparently winning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……
「し、信じられるかそんなこと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C-can you believe such a thing?!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

other.\""},{"lineNumber":130095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのおかげで人類は魔軍に攻められず","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thanks to that, humanity wasn't attacked by the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":130096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今までは平和に過ごせていましたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"and until now, we have lived in peace, but...\""},{"lineNumber":130097,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この戦いは三ヶ月ほど前、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"About three months ago, this war winning.\""},{"lineNumber":130099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...!"},{"lineNumber":130100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、信じられるかそんなこと！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-can you believe such a thing?!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事に戻っていいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can go back to work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事どころではないって言うかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not really a matter of work right now, you could say...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雇い主がこれからどうするのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to hear what our employer intends to do from here on...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その意向は聞いておきたいし……ねえ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to hear their intentions... right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく、なんなんだ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Jeez, what's going on..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス兄様っ、お久しぶりです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Big brother Rance, long time no see!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　香ちゃん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Kaoru-chan?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、お久しぶりです、香姫様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, long time no see, Princess Kaori!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィルさんも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seeral-san too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手紙で伺いましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard from your letter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に氷から解放されたんですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were truly freed from the ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご挨拶が遅れてすみません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry for the late greetings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またお会い出来て嬉しいです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm glad to see you again!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、何故ここに香ちゃんが？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But why is Kaoru-chan here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の顔を見て表情をパッと華やがせた香が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru's expression brightened when she saw Rance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その言葉で、すぐに顔を暗く沈ませた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but those words quickly made her face darken and become somber.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とても、大事なお願いがあって参りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I have come with a very important request."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのー……
何があったのか、私達まだサッパリで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We still don't understand at all what has happened...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだ、いい加減に説明しろ説明」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right, just explain it already."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that's true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、私の口から説明させて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, please allow me to explain it from my side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、人類国家は滅亡の危機に瀕しています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the human nations are facing the threat of extinction."
"...Why is that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「LP7年9月17日、今から二週間ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On LP year 7, September 17th, about two weeks ago,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリス率いる魔軍の大軍団が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a huge demonic army led by the demon lord Kaebris

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めてきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invaded us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「地図をご覧下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please look at the map."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス、ゼス、ヘルマン、自由都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ritsus, Zeth, Hellman, and the Free City,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもご存じの四つの大国が同時に攻め込まれました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the four great nations that even Rance knows were attacked all at once."
"...What is the state of the battle?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなり危険な状態です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is a very dangerous situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国も長年、魔軍に対し警戒し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Each country has been on alert against the demon army for years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸西の魔物界への防備を重ねていましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and has strengthened defenses against the Monster Realm in the west of the continent, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故か魔軍は、魔物界と人類側の国境からではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For some reason, the demon army did not attack from the border between the Monster Realm and the human side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の中心地点、キナニ砂漠から侵攻してきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but invaded from the central point of the world, the Kinani Desert."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「予想していなかった地点からの攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because the attack came from an unexpected point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国は為す術がなかったそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the countries had no way to respond."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「防衛は後手後手に回り、各地で魔軍に敗退しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense fell behind and they were defeated by the demon army in many places."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「既に各国の防衛軍は半壊、もう長くは保たないと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The defense forces of each country are already half-destroyed and I don't think they can hold much longer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……えいぷりるふーる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...April Fools'?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、現在まさに起こっている事実です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is the current reality happening right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待て待て！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait, wait!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスが率いて……と、言ったな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You said the demon lord Kaebris is leading them, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは絶対にありえない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is absolutely impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは魔物界でホーネット様の軍勢と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kaebris is supposed to be fighting against Hornet-sama's army in the Monster Realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中の筈……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He should be in the middle of that battle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな大規模な侵攻が出来るわけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way he can be leading such a large-scale invasion..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、長年、魔物界では魔人達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, for many years in the Monster Realm, the demon lords have been

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派とケイブリス派、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: divided into two factions: the Hornet faction and the Kaebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つの陣営に別れて戦争していました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they were at war with each other."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのおかげで人類は魔軍に攻められず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thanks to that, humanity wasn't attacked by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までは平和に過ごせていましたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and until now, we have lived in peace, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この戦いは三ヶ月ほど前、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About three months ago, this war ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派が勝利を収めたようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with the Kaebris faction apparently winning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ……
「し、信じられるかそんなこと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "C-can you believe such a thing?!"
